target: Your taxi booking has been completed! The car type is a red Audi, Contact number 07964587638. Can I assist with anything else?
context: <user> Hello, I am looking to find a restaurant that is in the centre. I would prefer something in the expensive price range. <system> I can help you with that. Do you have any cuisine preferences? <user> Yes, I would like to eat Chinese food. <system> Oh I have some great options for you. I have a total of 4 restaurants, how about trying th Ugly Duckling? <user> Yes that is good please make a booking for 8 people at 14:15 on sunday. <system> Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Your reference number is 076ZN8YF <user> I need a place to stay that has free parking and is in the expensive price range. <system> I found 33 hotels that match that criteria. Is there a particular side of town you prefer so I can make a recommendation?<user> It doesnt matter. I would like 4 stars and fee wifi though. <system> The huntingdon marriott hotel is a 4 star hotel<user> That sounds great! Does it have free parking and free wifi? <system> Yes it has both, would you like me to book you?<user> Yes please, I need rooms for 8 people starting Sunday for 3 nights. <system> Booking was successful. Reference number is : TBICSA49 . Is there anything else I can assist you with?<user> I need a taxi from the hotel to the restaurant by 14:15. Please provide the car type and contact number <system> I will be happy to book that for you. Where is your destination?<user> I need it to go between the hotel and restaurant, please. <system> I need to know where you are going?<user> TO THE RESTAURANT! JUST BOOK IT< YOU HAVE ALL OF MY INFO! thank you <system>
